New Records: Bobby Witt Jr. reached 100 RBIs and 31 home runs on the season
Key Match Events: Bobby Witt Jr. hit a sacrifice fly to the wall in dead center and an RBI double
The Royals scored five runs with six extra-base hits
Kris Bubic struck out pinch-hitter Joey Bart and Isiah Kiner-Falefa to escape a jam unscathed
Lucas Erceg pitched around a two-out double to finish the game
Pre-Game Insights: The Royals have a chance to sweep tomorrow with Brady Singer pitching against Jared Jones
Post-Match Reflections: The Royals have clinched their first winning season since 2015
The Magic Number to clinch a playoff berth stands at only eight
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Royals have won 11 of their last 12 against non-first-place opponents
The Royals have won six games in a row against teams that aren't in first place
